short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This WebExtension disallows FLoC by adding the proper HTTP Header.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This WebExtension specifically opts out of FLoC (Federated Learning of Cohorts). It is an open source WebExtension and we invite you to check its code before installing it: https://github.com/SphinxKnight/nofloc/
